author: wtopstaff
title: Devils-Sabres Sum
text:
1 1—3 
First Period_1, Buffalo, Ennis 2 (Franson, R.O’Reilly), 8:42 (pp). 2, New Jersey, Henrique 5 (Cammalleri, Stempniak), 19:10. 
Second Period_3, Buffalo, R.O’Reilly 3 (Reinhart, Ennis), 2:31. 4, New Jersey, Cammalleri 3 (Kalinin), 8:57. 5, New Jersey, Schlemko 1 (Cammalleri, Henrique), 19:11. 
Third Period_6, New Jersey, Henrique 6, 9:15 (sh). 7, Buffalo, Eichel 3 (R.O’Reilly), 19:15 (pp). 
Shots on Goal_New Jersey 7-13-8_28. Buffalo 6-12-11_29. 
Goalies_New Jersey, Schneider. Buffalo, Ullmark. A_18,040 (19,070). T_2:31. Topics:
